item.title: Build Wealth and Prosper
item.description: Personal finances are… personal. Everyone’s situation is different. Nevertheless, this post summarizes how to build wealth in the long term. Bottom line: save and invest your money. Why Become Wealthy? # Some people want to be rich so they can buy a lambo. Or maybe they want a bunch of hookers and cocaine. “Money talks, wealth whispers” Generally, reasons to become wealthy include: Lifestyle Choices - higher quality of life
